Package TransLib

Class TransportLib

java.lang.Object
TransLib.TransportLib
public class TransportLib
extends Object
TransportLib -- enables communication among Raft nodes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TransportLib​(int port, int id, MessageHandling messageHandling)
    Constructor for the TransportLib of a Raft node

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Message sendMessage​(Message message)
    Send message through message server(underlayer network), this function is a synchronous call which means the thread will be blocked until the response returns or a timeout occurs.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • TransportLib

      public TransportLib​(int port, int id, MessageHandling messageHandling)
      Constructor for the TransportLib of a Raft node
      Parameters:
      port - the port of server
      id - the id of this node
      messageHandling - the instance of the node

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public Message sendMessage​(Message message) throws RemoteException
      Send message through message server(underlayer network), this function is a synchronous call which means the thread will be blocked until the response returns or a timeout occurs. Always use this API to send a message.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send
      Returns:
      on success, returns the response, otherwise null
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when RMI fails
